name: SUPERSTRUCT (fawdot)
description:
Made for the GDevelop Game Jam #1

Build your ship, and fight endless waves of enemies! How long can you survive for?

Each wave increases in difficulty! There are 7 different weapons, and 2 different special weapons to choose from. 

PC Controls: Click and drag weapons in ship build.
Red is for normal weapons.
Purple is for special weapons.

Q or E to rotate weapon in weapon build (rotation upgrade available for 1500 points)

Z to shoot
X for bomb (if you have any equipped)
Shields are automatically used when hit.

Press ESC in game to go back to ship build.
